qas.question: Which school is located on Cabrini Boulevard?
On what street is the Dombrov Shtiebel?
Which University has a campus on 187th Street?
Cabrini Boulevard is just north of what street?
On what street is the Mount Sinai Jewish Center?

context: The many institutions on <a1_0><a4_0>187th Street<a4_0/><a1_0/> include Mount Sinai Jewish Center, the Dombrov Shtiebel, and the uptown campus of <a2_0>Yeshiva University<a2_0/>. The local public elementary school <a0_0>P.S. 187<a0_0/> is located on Cabrini Boulevard, just north of the eponymous <a3_0>187th Street<a3_0/>
